lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 1 Column A
description: Wages, salaries, tips, etc from Federal Form 1040 or 1040A, line 7, or 1040EZ, line 1 - Column A Rhode Island
taCalcNotes: from PYNRStateAllocation worksheet F1040 line 7 total for RI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 1 Column B
description: Wages, salaries, tips, etc from Federal Form 1040 or 1040A, line 7, or 1040EZ, line 1 - Column B Federal
taCalcNotes: from FederalResidentState allocation worksheet F1040 line 7 total for federal

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 2 Column A
description: Interest and dividends from Federal Form 1040 or 1040A, lines 8a and 9a, or 1040EZ, line 2 - Column A Rhode Island
taCalcNotes: Interest and dividends from PYNRStateAllocation worksheet total for RI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 2 Column B
description: Interest and dividends from Federal Form 1040 or 1040A, lines 8a and 9a, or 1040EZ, line 2 - Column B Federal
taCalcNotes: interest and dividends from FederalResidentState allocation worksheet

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 3 Column A
description: Business income from Federal Form 1040, line 12 - Column A Rhode Island
taCalcNotes: Schedule C business income from PYNRStateAllocation worksheet

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 3 Column B
description: Business income from Federal Form 1040, line 12 - Column B Federal
taCalcNotes: Schedule C Business income from FederalResidentState allocation worksheet

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 4 Column A
description: Sale or exchange of property from Federal Form 1040, lines 13 or 14, or 1040A, line 10 - Column A Rhode Island
taCalcNotes: Form lines 13 and 14 of the 1040 which comes from the schedule D and Form 4797 from PYNRStateAllocation worksheet

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 4 Column B
description: Sale or exchange of property from Federal Form 1040, lines 13 or 14, or 1040A, line 10 - Column B Federal
taCalcNotes: Form lines 13 and 14 of the 1040 which comes from the schedule D and Form 4797 from FederalResidentState allocation worksheet

lineNumber: Background Calc
description: Pension and annuities
taCalcNotes: Taxable Pensions and IRAs from FederalResidentState Allocation Worksheet

lineNumber: Background Calc
description: Rents, Royalties, etc. - to be used if business allocation occurs
taCalcNotes: Rents, Royalties, etc. from FederalResidentState Allocation Worksheet

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 5 Column A
description: Pension and annuities; rents, royalties, etc. from Federal Form 1040, lines 15b, 16b, and 17, or 1040A, lines 11b and 12b - Column A Rhode Island
taCalcNotes: Pensions, IRA, and Schedule E amounts from rents roaylties, K-1's from PYNRStateAllocation worksheet

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 5 Column B
description: Pension and annuities; rents, royalties, etc. from Federal Form 1040, lines 15b, 16b, and 17, or 1040A, lines 11b and 12b - Column B Federal
taCalcNotes: Pensions, IRA, and Schedule E amounts from rents roaylties, K-1's from FederalResidentState allocation worksheet

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 6 Column A
description: Farm income from Federal Form 1040, line 18 - Column A Rhode Island
taCalcNotes: Schedule F from PYNRStateAllocation worksheet

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 6 Column B
description: Farm income from Federal Form 1040, line 18 - Column B Federal
taCalcNotes: Schedule F  from FederalResidentState allocation worksheet

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 7 Column A
description: Miscellaneous income from Federal Form 1040, lines 10, 11, 19, 20b and 21; 1040A, lines 13 and 14b; or 1040EZ, line 3 - Column A Rhode Island
taCalcNotes: state refund, alimony, unemployment, taxable SS, and other income from line 21 of 1040 from PYNRStateAllocation worksheet

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 7 Column B
description: Miscellaneous income from Federal Form 1040, lines 10, 11, 19, 20b and 21; 1040A, lines 13 and 14b; or 1040EZ, line 3 - Column B Federal
taCalcNotes: state refund, alimony, unemployment, taxable SS, and other income from line 21 of 1040 from FederalResidentState allocation worksheet

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 8 Column A
description: TOTAL. Add lines 1 through 7 - Column A Rhode Island
taCalcNotes: Add Col A amounts line 1 through 7

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 8 Column B
description: TOTAL. Add lines 1 through 7 - Column B Federal
taCalcNotes: Add Col B amounts line 1 through 8

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 9 Column A
description: Adjustments to AGI from Federal Form 1040, line 36, or 1040A, line 20 - Column A Rhode Island
taCalcNotes: from PYNRStateAllocation worksheet

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 9 Column B
description: Adjustments to AGI from Federal Form 1040, line 36, or 1040A, line 20 - Column B Federal
taCalcNotes: from FederalResidentState allocation worksheet

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 10 Column A
description: Adjusted gross income. Subtract line 9 from line 8 - Column A Rhode Island
taCalcNotes: Line 8 Column A - Line 9 Column A

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 10 Column B
description: Adjusted gross income. Subtract line 9 from line 8 - Column B Federal
taCalcNotes: Line 8 Column B - Line 9 Column B

lineNumber: UI Question
description: Net modifications to Federal AGI from RI-1040NR, page 5, RI Schedule M, line 3
taCalcNotes: Get Line 3 of Schedule M but allow user to change

lineNumber: UI Question
description: Checkbox to verify adjustments and modifications
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 11 Column A
description: Net modifications to Federal AGI from RI-1040NR, RI Schedule M, line 3 - Column A Rhode Island
taCalcNotes: Get the RI amount as adjusted by the user in the UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 11 Column B
description: Net modifications to Federal AGI from RI-1040NR, RI Schedule M, line 3 - Column B Federal
taCalcNotes: Schedule M Line 3

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 12 Column A
description: Modified Federal AGI. Combine lines 10 and 11. - Column A Rhode Island
taCalcNotes: Line 10 Column A plus Line 11 Column A

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 12 Column B
description: Modified Federal AGI. Combine lines 10 and 11 The amount in column B must equal the amount on RI-1040NR, page 1, line 3. - Column B Federal
taCalcNotes: Line 10 Column B plus Line 11 Column B

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 13
description: Allocation. Divide line 12, col. A by Line 12, col. B. If line 12, col. A is greater than line 12, col. B, enter 1.0000.
taCalcNotes: If line 12, col. A is greater than line 12, col. B, enter 1.0000; otherwise populate Line 12 Column A divided by Line 12 Column B

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 14
description: RI tax after allowable federal credits before allocation from RI-1040NR, page 1, line 10
taCalcNotes: Form RI-1040NR, Line 10 RI Tax

lineNumber: Background Calc
description: Condition to determine if the bottom line of the schedule should be calculated
taCalcNotes: IF the Part-Year/Nonresident state is RI and Residency is Nonresident THEN populate YES; otherwise NO

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Line 15
description: RI INCOME TAX. Multiply line 14 by line 13. Enter here and on RI-1040NR, page 1, line11. Check the Nonresident box
taCalcNotes: RI tax on line 14 multiplied by the percantage on line 13

lineNumber: UI Question
description: Did you work for the same employer in more than one state, and your wages or salary income has not been allocated on your W-2, and you would like to allocate your wages, salaries, tips, etc by the number of days you worked in Rhode Island?
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 2, Line 1
description: Wages, salaries, tips, etc
taCalcNotes: Total Federal Wages

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 2, Line 2
description: Total days in the year
taCalcNotes: Number of days in the year this is a constant 365 or 366 if leap year

lineNumber: UI Question
description: Sick Leave Days - user entry
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 2, Line 3
description: Sick leave days
taCalcNotes: IF user selects to allocate THEN populate the direct entry value; otherwise leave blank

lineNumber: UI Question
description: Vacation Days - user entry
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 2, Line 4
description: Vacation days
taCalcNotes: IF user selects to allocate THEN populate the direct entry value; otherwise leave blank

lineNumber: UI Question
description: Other nonworking days (Saturdays, Sundays, holidays, etc.) - user entry
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 2, Line 5
description: Other nonworking days (Saturdays, Sundays, holidays, etc.)
taCalcNotes: IF user selects to allocate THEN populate the direct entry value; otherwise leave blank

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 2, Line 6
description: Total nonworking days. Add lines 3, 4 and 5.
taCalcNotes: Line 3 plus Line 4 plus Line 5

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 2, Line 7
description: Total days worked in the year. Subtract line 6 from line 2.
taCalcNotes: Line 2 minus Line 6

lineNumber: UI Question
description: Total days worked outside Rhode Island - user entry
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 2, Line 8
description: Total days worked outside Rhode Island
taCalcNotes: IF user selects to allocate THEN populate the direct entry value; otherwise leave blank

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 2, Line 9
description: Days worked in Rhode Island. Subtract line 8 from line 7.
taCalcNotes: Line 7 minus Line 8

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 2, Line 10
description: Allocation. Divide line 9 by line 7.
taCalcNotes: Line 9 divided by Line 7 to four decimal places

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 2, Line 11
description: RI AMOUNT. Multiply line 1 by line 10. Enter here and include on RI-1040NR, page 7, Schedule II, line 1, column A
taCalcNotes: Line 1 multiplied by Line 10

lineNumber: UI Question
description: Do you have Rhode Island business income that is not separate and distinct from that of other states that needs to be allocated?
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: UI Question
description: Select the Business Income items that need to be allocated: Interest and Dividends from Federal Form 1040 Lines 8a or 9a
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: UI Question
description: Select the Business Income items that need to be allocated: Business Income from Federal Form 1040, Line 12
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: UI Question
description: Select the Business Income items that need to be allocated: Sale or exchange of property from Federal Form 1040, Lines 13 or 14
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: UI Question
description: Select the Business Income items that need to be allocated: Rents, Royalties, etc. from Federal Form 1040, Line 17
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: UI Question
description: Select the Business Income items that need to be allocated: Farm Income from Federal Form 1040, Line 18
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: UI Question
description: Select the Business Income items that need to be allocated: Miscellaneous Income from Federal Form 1040, Lines 10, 11, 19, 20b and 21
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 1 Column A
description: Real property owned - Column A RI Amounts
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 1 Column B
description: Real property owned - Column B Total amounts
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 2 Column A
description: Real property rented from others (8 x annual net rental rate) - Column A RI Amounts
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 2 Column B
description: Real property rented from others (8 x annual net rental rate)  - Column B Total amounts
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 3 Column A
description: Tangible personal property owned - Column A RI Amounts
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 3 Column B
description: Tangible personal property owned - Column B Total amounts
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 4 Column A
description: Total property. Add lines 1, 2 and 3 - Column A RI Amounts
taCalcNotes: Add lines 1, 2 and 3 Col A RI amounts

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 4 Column B
description: Total property. Add lines 1, 2 and 3 - Column B Total amounts
taCalcNotes: Add lines 1, 2 and 3, column B Total amounts

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 4 Column C
description: Total property. Divide column A by column B. - Column C (Column A / Column B)
taCalcNotes: Divide line 4 column A by column B. (Four decimal places)

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 5 Column A
description: Wages salaries and other personal service compensation - Column A RI Amounts
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 5 Column B
description: Wages salaries and other personal service compensation - Column B Total amounts
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 5 Column C
description: Wages salaries and other personal service compensation Divide line 5 column A by column B.  - Column C (Column A / Column B)
taCalcNotes: Divide line 5 column A by column B. (Four decimal places)

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 6 Column A
description: Gross sales - Column A RI Amounts
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 6 Column B
description: Gross sales - Column B Total amounts
taCalcNotes: direct entry in UI

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 6 Column C
description: Gross sales - Column C (Column A / Column B)
taCalcNotes: Divide line  column A by column B. (Four decimal places)

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 7
description: Total of Percentages in column C. Add lines 4, 5, and 6
taCalcNotes: Add the percentages in Col C lines 4, 5, 6 (Four decimal places)

lineNumber: RI Schedule II, Part 3, Line 8
description: BUSINESS ALLOCATION PERCENTAGE. Divide Line 7 by three (3), or the number of percentages on lines 4, 5, and 6. Enter here and in column B below.
taCalcNotes: Divide the total percantage from line 6 either by 3, 2, or 1. To determine this check the number of line entries on lines 4 5 6. If only 1 line has an entry then divide by 1 If any combination of only two lines have entries then divide by 2, If all three lines have an entry then divide by 3 (Four decimal places)
calculationTaxAnalysisString: //*//[RISch2BusTotPer] divided by the number of line entries on 4 ,5, and 6. ( 1 ,2, or 3)
calculationTranslation: //*//[TotalPercentagesColumnC] divided by the number of line entries on 4 ,5, and 6. ( 1 ,2, or 3)

lineNumber: Line 9, 10, 11, 12, and 13 (line number of income)
description: Line number from RI-1040NR, Sch II, Col B, Line
taCalcNotes: Populate the Line number of the business income that is being allocated

lineNumber: Line 9, 10, 11, 12, and 13 Column A (line amount of income)
description: Column A Income to be allocated
taCalcNotes: List the amount of income from Part 1 Column B of the corresponding income per the line number

lineNumber: Line 9, 10, 11, 12, and 13 Column B (pecentage of income)
description: the percentage from part 3 line 8
taCalcNotes: the percentage from line 8 will be listed in each column that has an entry

lineNumber: Line 9, 10, 11, 12, and 13 Col C  (allocated income)
description: Column A times Column B
taCalcNotes: the amount of income listed in column A multiplied by the percentage in column B
